name: Keyboard - My Photo keyboard, Emoji Keyboard
description: My Photo Keyboard is a personalized photo keyboard with beautiful keyboard themes, cute emoji keyboard, colorful wallpaper keyboard, various of emoticons and kinds of fonts! Also, you can customize the keyboard and keyboard background!   DIY Keyboard Themes Customize the keyboard backgroud with any photo you choose, also you can change it or decorate it anywhere.  The brightness of the theme is adjustable. And the photo you choose can be blurred to clear the numbers and letters on the keyboard. Or put the original image to beautify the keyboard.  Customize your own keyboard with the DIY Keyboard - My Photo Keyboard.   Wallpaper Keyboard A number of wallpapers can be applied to the keyboard background! Therere many HD wallpapers you can choose, such as live wallpapers, cool wallpapers, cute wallpapers and so on.   Multiple Keyboard Templates Many fancy and special filter keyboard templates are provided for you! Just typing the one that you love!   Emoji Keyboard Typing the Emojis of your emoji keyboard to make your message vivid. You can express your emotion lively with emojis. We have multiple emojis to help you to convey your emotion.    Fun Emoticons Fun emoticons, such as ^_^ o()o ... to make your chat interesting! With the fun emoticons, more and more people will like to chat with you!   Fonts Want your chat more interesting and yourself more charming! Come to choose your fonts! That will make your chat special! After using the photo keyboard, your life will become more colorful!   Smart Word Prediction You dont need to type all words out anymore! With the smart word prediction function, word will be shown when you just type two or three alphabets.   Multiple Language Support Photo Keyboard, , , teclado, , clavier, ,  , klavye, Tastatur, ,    Features   My Photo Keyboard Cute Emoji Keyboard Colorful Wallpaper Keyboard Various of Emoticons Kinds of Fonts Smart Word Prediction Multiple Language Supported  Contact Photo Keyboard : Email: cghxstudio@gmail.com
